enb_long_title: IPCC-29 and Twentieth Anniversary of the IPCC
section_title: FRAMEWORK AND CRITERIA FOR SPECIAL REPORTS, METHODOLOGY REPORTS AND TECHNICAL PAPERS:
sentences: On Thursday afternoon, Australia introduced its proposal to consider cross-cutting issues that require input from more than one working group on the framework and criteria for Special Reports, Methodology Reports and Technical Papers ( IPCC-XXIX/Doc.4 ).
The Panel agreed to the proposal with a minor amendment.
